entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
